query:
UPDATE ingestion_work_units
            SET status = CASE
                    WHEN retry_count + 1 >= max_retries THEN 'failed'::text
                    ELSE 'pending'::text
                END,
                retry_count = retry_count + 1,
                last_error = $1,
                worker_id = NULL,
                worker_hostname = NULL,
                claimed_at = NULL,
                heartbeat_at = NULL
            WHERE id = $2
            RETURNING retry_count, max_retries
